title.sub1: Welcome to the Free Trial Version

askmore.title: Discover the next version
askmore.text:
This is the minimal version (MVP) of ConfidIA, limited in terms of both front and back functionality.
 
For a demo of the existing advanced version contact us : 
	confidia@ DS FOR DS.fr
	+33 (0)6 47 98 65 71

python.py: ConfidIA automatically determines the version of python you are using
